segments.text: Guess what ? Paul and Susan are engaged .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: A week ago ? They met last summer and now just sink . They will be married soon .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Have they set a date for the wedding ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , not yet . But Susan says they ’ d like to get married in November or December . Then they ’ ll go to Hawaii for their honeymoon .
segments.speaker: S1
